description: This table contains the follow-ups describing why a service request for continued care or services is being considered.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: DP_FAC_FOLLOW_UP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the follow-up for a service provider that is considering the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Need insurance authorization


Need bed availability


Need clinical review


Patient not stable


Need additional clinical information


Requires onsite review


Need family discussion


Need COVID-19 immunization record


Need expected discharge date


Need negative COVID-19 test


Other (Comment)
